dcterms:creator: J. B. Kenney
dcterms:description: This dataset relates to Dedicated Short-Range Communications (DSRC) standards in the United States, which are crucial for Vehicle-to-Vehicle (V2V) and Vehicle-to-Infrastructure (V2I) communications in connected autonomous vehicles.
dcterms:title: Dedicated Short-Range Communications (DSRC) Standards in the United States

dcterms:creator: J. Rios-Torres
A. A. Malikopoulos
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the impact of partial penetrations of connected and automated vehicles on fuel consumption and traffic flow, providing insights into how these vehicles interact with existing traffic systems.
dcterms:title: Impact of partial penetrations of connected and automated vehicles on fuel consumption and traffic flow

dcterms:creator: J. Rios-Torres
A. A. Malikopoulos
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a survey on the coordination of connected and automated vehicles at intersections and merging at highway on-ramps, highlighting the challenges and methodologies in this area.
dcterms:title: A Survey on the Coordination of Connected and Automated Vehicles at Intersections and Merging at Highway On-Ramps

dcterms:creator: A. D. Ames
S. Coogan
M. Egerstedt
G. Notomista
K. Sreenath
P. Tabuada
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses control barrier functions and their applications, providing theoretical foundations and practical implementations for ensuring safety in control systems.
dcterms:title: Control barrier functions: Theory and applications

dcterms:creator: S. Chen
K. Saulnier
N. Atanasov
D. D. Lee
V. Kumar
G. J. Pappas
M. Morari
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the approximation of explicit model predictive control using constrained neural networks, providing insights into the integration of machine learning with control strategies.
dcterms:title: Approximating explicit model predictive control using constrained neural networks

dcterms:creator: R. Cheng
G. Orosz
R. M. Murray
J. W. Burdick
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a method for end-to-end safe reinforcement learning through barrier functions, focusing on safety-critical continuous control tasks.
dcterms:title: End-to-end safe reinforcement learning through barrier functions for safety-critical continuous control tasks

dcterms:creator: S. Dixit
S. Fallah
U. Montanaro
M. Dianati
A. Stevens
F. Mccullough
A. Mouzakitis
dcterms:description: This dataset reviews trajectory planning and tracking for autonomous overtaking, discussing state-of-the-art methods and future prospects in this area.
dcterms:title: Trajectory planning and tracking for autonomous overtaking: State-of-the-art and future prospects

dcterms:creator: A. Talebpour
H. S. Mahmassani
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates the influence of connected and autonomous vehicles on traffic flow stability and throughput, providing insights into their impact on transportation systems.
dcterms:title: Influence of connected and autonomous vehicles on traffic flow stability and throughput

dcterms:creator: F. Gritschneder
K. Graichen
K. Dietmayer
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on fast trajectory planning for automated vehicles using gradient-based nonlinear model predictive control, discussing methodologies and applications.
dcterms:title: Fast Trajectory Planning for Automated Vehicles using Gradient-based Nonlinear Model Predictive Control
